items.name: Document Identification
items.summary: Metadata, tagging, and document title requirements.

items.name: Forms & Alt Text
items.summary: Interactive elements need names and alternative text.

items.name: Annotations
items.summary: Annotations require Contents text for assistive tech.

items.name: Structure Tree
items.summary: Structure element semantics, RoleMap, and reading order.

items.name: Artifacts
items.summary: Artifacts must be separate from tagged content.

issues.description: Found 1 table(s) that may lack proper header markup

items.name: Tables
items.summary: Tables require header associations and structure.

issues.description: Image on page 1 lacks alternative text
Image on page 3 lacks alternative text

items.name: Non-text Content
items.summary: Provide text alternatives for non-text content.

issues.description: Found 1 table(s) that may lack proper header markup

items.name: Info and Relationships
items.summary: Preserve semantics so assistive technology can convey relationships.

items.name: Meaningful Sequence
items.summary: Ensure reading order preserves intended meaning.

issues.description: Document contains images - text contrast should be manually verified
Text on page 2 has low contrast (~1.8:1) against assumed white background

items.name: Contrast (Minimum)
items.summary: Text/background contrast must be at least 4.5:1 for body text.

issues.description: Text on page 2 has low contrast (~1.8:1) against assumed white background

items.name: Contrast (Enhanced)
items.summary: Enhanced 7:1 contrast aids users with low vision.

issues.description: Document lacks a bypass block or clear entry point.

items.name: Bypass Blocks
items.summary: Provide the ability to skip repeated content via clear headings or bookmarks.

items.name: Page Titled
items.summary: Provide descriptive titles so users can identify content.

items.name: Link Purpose (In Context)
items.summary: Ensure link text, tooltips, or alt descriptions clearly explain the target destination.

items.name: Language of Page
items.summary: Declare the primary language for pronunciation support.

items.name: Labels or Instructions
items.summary: Provide instructions so users know required input.

manual.description: Found 1 table(s) that may lack proper header markup
manual.instructions: Use PDF editor to define table headers, data cells, and proper table structure
manual.title: Fix table structure

manual.description: Document contains images - text contrast should be manually verified
manual.instructions: Modify text and background colors to achieve at least 4.5:1 contrast ratio
manual.title: Improve color contrast

manual.description: Text on page 2 has low contrast (~1.8:1) against assumed white background
manual.instructions: Modify text and background colors to achieve at least 4.5:1 contrast ratio
manual.title: Improve color contrast

semiAutomated.action: Add a clear first-page H1 heading, accessible bookmarks/outlines, or an internal TOC so users can bypass repeated content.
semiAutomated.description: Document lacks a bypass block or clear entry point.
semiAutomated.title: Fix WCAG 2.4.1 issue

semiAutomated.action: Review and add descriptive alt text for images
semiAutomated.description: Image on page 1 lacks alternative text
semiAutomated.title: Add alternative text to images

semiAutomated.action: Review and add descriptive alt text for images
semiAutomated.description: Image on page 3 lacks alternative text
semiAutomated.title: Add alternative text to images

semiAutomated.action: Ensure all tables have properly marked header rows and columns.
semiAutomated.description: Found 1 table(s) that may lack proper header markup
semiAutomated.title: Fix PDF/UA ISO 14289-1:7.5 issue

semiAutomated.action: Set MarkInfo.Marked to true in document catalog
semiAutomated.title: Fix PDF/UA ISO 14289-1:7.1 issue

semiAutomated.action: Add a structure tree root to the document catalog
semiAutomated.title: Fix PDF/UA ISO 14289-1:7.1 issue

issues.description: Found 1 table(s) that may lack proper header markup
Image on page 1 lacks alternative text
Image on page 3 lacks alternative text
Found 1 table(s) that may lack proper header markup
Document contains images - text contrast should be manually verified
Text on page 2 has low contrast (~1.8:1) against assumed white background
Document lacks a bypass block or clear entry point.

pdfuaIssues.remediation: Set MarkInfo.Marked to true in document catalog
Add a structure tree root to the document catalog

pdfuaIssues.description: Found 1 table(s) that may lack proper header markup
pdfuaIssues.remediation: Ensure all tables have properly marked header rows and columns.

poorContrast.description: Document contains images - text contrast should be manually verified
poorContrast.recommendation: Manually check that all text has sufficient contrast ratio (4.5:1 for normal text)
poorContrast.wcagCriteria: 1.4.3 Contrast (Minimum) (Level AA) – Text/background contrast must be at least 4.5:1 for body text.; 1.4.6 Contrast (Enhanced) (Level AAA) – Enhanced 7:1 contrast aids users with low vision.

poorContrast.description: Text on page 2 has low contrast (~1.8:1) against assumed white background
poorContrast.recommendation: Increase text color contrast to at least 4.5:1 (WCAG 1.4.3 / 1.4.6).
poorContrast.wcagCriteria: 1.4.3 Contrast (Minimum) (Level AA) – Text/background contrast must be at least 4.5:1 for body text.; 1.4.6 Contrast (Enhanced) (Level AAA) – Enhanced 7:1 contrast aids users with low vision.

tableIssues.description: Found 1 table(s) that may lack proper header markup
tableIssues.recommendation: Ensure all tables have properly marked header rows and columns.
tableIssues.wcagCriteria: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships (Level A) – Preserve semantics so assistive technology can convey relationships.

wcagIssues.description: Image on page 1 lacks alternative text
wcagIssues.remediation: Add alternative text for meaningful images, or mark them as decorative where appropriate.
wcagIssues.wcagCriteria: 1.1.1 Non-text Content (Level A) – Provide text alternatives for non-text content.

wcagIssues.description: Image on page 3 lacks alternative text
wcagIssues.remediation: Add alternative text for meaningful images, or mark them as decorative where appropriate.
wcagIssues.wcagCriteria: 1.1.1 Non-text Content (Level A) – Provide text alternatives for non-text content.

wcagIssues.description: Document lacks a bypass block or clear entry point.
wcagIssues.remediation: Add a clear first-page H1 heading, accessible bookmarks/outlines, or an internal TOC so users can bypass repeated content.
wcagIssues.wcagCriteria: 2.4.1 Bypass Blocks (Level A) – Provide the ability to skip repeated content via clear headings or bookmarks.
